This template allows you to anchor a virtual model onto real-world surfaces, blending digital content with your physical environment.

<b>How it works:</b> It uses the WebXR Depth Sensing API to detect the geometry of your surroundings, enabling you to place objects accurately on floors, tables, or walls.

import { DocsIFrame } from '../DocsIFrame.jsx';
import { DocsSource } from '../DocsSource.jsx';

<DocsIFrame template="3_depth"></DocsIFrame>
<DocsSource template="3_depth"></DocsSource>
